00011 // Do this before the class declaration, since the class itself
00012 // uses it.
00013 class MemoryStream;
00014 typedef boost::shared_ptr<MemoryStream> MemoryStreamPtr;
00015 
00021 class MemoryStream : public Stream
00022 {
00023   const void *data;
00024   size_t length, pos;
00025 
00026  public:
00027  MemoryStream(const void *ptr, size_t len)
00028    : data(ptr), length(len), pos(0)
00029   {
00030     isSeekable = true;
00031     hasPosition = true;
00032     hasSize = true;
00033     hasPtr = true;
00034   }
00035 
00036   MemoryStream()
00037     : data(NULL), length(0), pos(0)
00038   {
00039     isSeekable = true;
00040     hasPosition = true;
00041     hasSize = true;
00042     hasPtr = true;
00043   }
00044 
00045   size_t read(void *buf, size_t count)
00046   {
00047     assert(data != NULL);
00048     assert(pos <= length);
00049 
00050     // Don't read more than we have
00051     if(count > (length - pos))
00052       count = length - pos;
00053 
00054     // Copy data
00055     if(count)
00056       memcpy(buf, ((char*)data)+pos, count);
00057 
00058     // aaand remember to increase the count
00059     pos += count;
00060 
00061     return count;
00062   }
00063 
00064   void seek(size_t _pos)
00065   {
00066     pos = _pos;
00067     if(pos > length)
00068       pos = length;
00069   }
00070 
00071   size_t tell() const { return pos; }
00072   size_t size() const { return length; }
00073   bool eof() const { return pos == length; }
00074 
00075   const void *getPtr() { return data; }
00076   const void *getPtr(size_t size)
00077     {
00078       // This variant of getPtr must move the position pointer
00079       size_t opos = pos;
00080       pos += size;
00081       if(pos > length) pos = length;
00082       return ((char*)data)+opos;
00083     }
00084   const void *getPtr(size_t pos, size_t size)
00085     {
00086       if(pos > length) pos = length;
00087       return ((char*)data)+pos;
00088     }
00089 
00090   // New members in MemoryStream:
00091 
00093   void set(const void* _data, size_t _length)
00094   {
00095     data = _data;
00096     length = _length;
00097     pos = 0;
00098   }
00099 
00101 
00107   MemoryStreamPtr clone(bool setPos=false) const
00108   {
00109     MemoryStreamPtr res(new MemoryStream(data, length));
00110     if(setPos) res->seek(pos);
00111     return res;
00112   }
00113 };
